session_summary: Calvin and Dave caught up at 10:11 am on 19 October, 2023. Calvin shared about touring with Frank Ocean, feeling a great connection with the crowd, and performing on stage. Dave congratulated him and asked about the tour, showing excitement about their collaboration. Calvin mentioned meeting Frank at a festival and feeling lucky to perform with him. They discussed the energy of the crowd, shared photos of the tour, and talked about Tokyo's vibrant atmosphere. Calvin revealed his upcoming trip to Tokyo, mentioning places like Shibuya Crossing and Shinjuku he's excited to visit. Dave recommended trying ramen, sharing a photo of a bowl he tried in Boston. Calvin agreed to give it a shot in Tokyo and appreciated the encouragement. They ended the conversation with Calvin looking forward to the trip and saying goodbye.

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a band performing on stage with bright lights
conversation_turns.text: Hey Dave! Been a few days since we talked, but lots happened. Started touring with Frank Ocean and it's been amazing - so much energy from the crowd, such a connection when I'm on stage - unreal! Take a look at how I performed on stage, that was awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Congrats, Calvin! That's awesome. Being able to play your music to a crowd and feel that connection must be unreal. How's the tour going?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! The tour has been great, the energy from the crowd is awesome and jamming with Frank Ocean is a dream come true. It's been amazing!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin! I bet performing with him is like a dream come true! How did it happen?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a band performing on stage with a projection of a man on the wall
conversation_turns.query: frank ocean performance on stage music festival sweaty
conversation_turns.text: It all started August last year when we met at a festival and he said he wanted to collaborate. We clicked right away and the chemistry on stage was incredible. I'm so lucky! Check the photo, of how we perfectly look together on stage!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin - you and Frank are so in tune! It's clear you both rock on stage. Can't wait to catch your show!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a large crowd of people in a large auditorium
conversation_turns.query: crowd performance hands in the air
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! I'm so excited you'll be at one of our shows. It's such a great experience, you'll definitely enjoy it! Look at this crowd, that was insane!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: That sounds really exciting! Can't wait to experience it. I'm sure everyone in the crowd is going to be pumped up!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a crowd of people at a concert with their hands in the air
conversation_turns.text: Wow, the crowd energy is amazing! It always gets me so pumped and it's awesome. Look at that photo, that was awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin, that's an awesome pic! Everyone looks so pumped. Where was that taken?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! That pic was taken in Tokyo during a concert. Man, the energy was nuts - felt like the whole city came out!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a busy street with people walking and shopping
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin, Tokyo looks incredible! Here's a pic I found online, and it's making me dream about visiting someday. The energy there seems unbeatable! Have you ever visited streets like that?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Yes, Dave! That was an incredible experience to visit similar streets like you shared in your photo. Is there anything else that interests you in Tokyo?

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a crowded street at night with people walking and walking
conversation_turns.query: tokyo busy street neon lights crowd
conversation_turns.text: Of course, Calvin! Tokyo is amazing! I want to know everything about it - the people, the culture, the food, take a walk at the vibrant city life! In the photo below, the city is so alive and colorful that's impressive! It will be an unforgettable experience!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: That photo's a great pic! The lights, the people - so lively! Can't wait to hear your emotions when you see that in person!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: It's really amazing. Hope I'll get to see it in person soon!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a city at night with a tall building in the background
conversation_turns.text: Cool, Dave! I'm actually going to Tokyo next month after the tour ends. Sometimes I wish I could go back to places like the one in the photo below. What a great view!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin! That's great to hear! Any specific spots in Tokyo that you're really excited to check out?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a crowd of people with umbrellas in the rain
conversation_turns.text: Yeah definitely! Shibuya Crossing is like Tokyo's Times Square, and I was excited to explore Shinjuku. Plus, there's amazing food there, can't wait to try it again! Look at the photo of Shibuya Crossing at night, that's amazing!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a bowl of soup with broccoli and noodles
conversation_turns.text: Shibuya and Shinjuku are cool spots! The food in Tokyo is great, I'll have so much fun exploring all the different places. Have you tried ramen yet? Here's a photo of a ramen bowl that I tried in Boston, it was delicious, but i think in Tokyo it will be even better!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! Never tried it, but it's supposed to be awesome. Gonna give it a shot while in Tokyo!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Do it, Calvin! Once you try it, you'll never go back. Bon voyage and have fun!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! I'll definitely give it a shot. Appreciate the encouragement! See you soon, bye!

Calvin: Calvin resumes his tour with Frank Ocean that ends in November.
Calvin plans on returning to Tokyo in November after the Frank Ocean tour ends and exploring spots like Shibuya crossing and Shinjuku.
Calvin started touring with Frank Ocean, which started in August last year after they met at a festival.
Calvin is excited about the energy from the crowd during the tour and feels lucky to collaborate and perform with Frank Ocean.
Calvin and Frank Ocean have a great chemistry on stage, and Calvin feels fortunate about it.
Calvin and Frank Ocean are in tune and rock on stage together.
Calvin performed in Tokyo during a concert and felt the energy of the crowd was nuts.
Calvin is planning to visit Tokyo next month after the tour ends and wishes sometimes to go back to places similar to those in the shared photos.
Calvin is excited to explore Shibuya Crossing and Shinjuku in Tokyo and is looking forward to trying the amazing food there.
Calvin has never tried ramen but is planning to try it while in Tokyo.
Dave: Dave is interested in Calvin's tour experience and acknowledges the connection Calvin feels with the crowd and performing on stage.
Dave found a photo online of Tokyo that makes him dream about visiting someday and is interested in learning about the city.
Dave wants to explore the people, culture, food, and vibrant city life of Tokyo and considers it an unforgettable experience.
Dave asks Calvin about specific spots in Tokyo he is excited to check out, such as Shibuya Crossing and Shinjuku.
Dave shares a photo of a ramen bowl he tried in Boston and recommends Calvin to try it in Tokyo.
